title: McCann Taps Media-Agency Group Leader for Top Role as CEO Leaves Post; Daryl Lee will take over as McCann Worldgroup CEO, succeeding Bill Kolb, who will remain chairman
text:
Mr. Lee is global chief executive of IPG Mediabrands, the division of IPG that oversees the holding company's ad-buying firms.

McCann Worldgroup is an advertising agency network that houses agencies such as relationship-management firm MRM, sponsorship-and-events agency Momentum and production shop Craft. The company's clients include Verizon Communications Inc. and Microsoft Corp.

Suzanne Vranica contributed to this article.
